short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easiest and fastest way to copy CF pages or turn any page into a Clickfunnels page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CF Editor page cloner. 4.0

NEW ACCOUNTS (Freemium Model)
3 FREE Live Hacks!

FREE (FOREVER) Version:
Use this for pages YOU OWN that you need to copy from one funnel to another or from one page type to another.

IE: You have used an OPTIN form for an ORDER by mistake, just use this to move ALL your content in seconds.

PRO Version:
If you want a version that can copy LIVE pages from the internet for you to Funnel Hack, you can upgrade within the extension at https://funnelhacking.app/package
**NOTE: All images will be blurred and text replaced to lorem ipsum to protect users IP.

Find a great looking funnel or web page on the net and it's not in Clickfunnels yet? No sweat, hit the extension and submit it as a MANUAL HACK and within 1 week we will create the page in Clickfunnels for you...no way!! Yes way.
(This is also a paid feature...obviously)

**COMING SOON**
- Auto Hacks for other major platforms (Highlevel, Wordpress pages, etc) - Powered by AI!
- Convert CF 1.0 > CF 2.0 in 1 click!

What's new in 4.0?
** REGISTER WITHOUT CF ACCOUNT **
- One of the most requested new features this year!!
- No need for CF 1.0 Classic account anymore!
- No need for a CF account at all (CF > GHL direct)
- Credits on initial sign up

Recent Changes
GHL Integration!! Directly clone from a live/editor CF page to GHL even if the link isn't working (a well known bug in the internal integration)
- Clone your MANUAL HACKS or anything from the hack library to your Highlevel account.
- No more need for a CF account to run the extension!
- Chrome Fix!! Manual hacks working again properly.
-AI Content Creator - YES! We have a connection with OpenAI (ChatGPT) and you can create unlimited content on our premium plan. Amazing!!
  - Headlines
  - Page Copy
  - Reviews/Testimonials
  ..and more!
- LIVE Hack Browser now live!!
You can browse our extensive library of over 5000 popular hacks.
Just use one of your live hack credits to add to the extension from the dashboard.
- Clone Database Explorer (visually explore and instantly grab any of the 1000's of previously cloned pages into your account) NOW LIVE!!
- Manual Hacks Database Marketplace (search, and purchase instantly high converting funnel pages hacked from other sites - 1-time fee for members!)
- Cloudflare and Bitbucket o-auth login issue resolved (finally! you can leave the extension on all the time now)
- Speed enhancements
- Fix for some anti-hack pages
- Fixes for some "Add to extension" pages not working 100%
- Dashboard re-adding NOW FREE FOR ALL! Add hacks from your history
Bug Fixes (2.85)
- CF subdomain update fix
- Wordpress Plugin CF Pages Now Clone correctly!
- Dashboard hack listing speed improvements
- Manual hack speed improvements (dashboard)
- Minor UI and UX updates
- Minimized Branding
- Custom CSS bug fixed
- Custom CSS cloning re-added to extension
- Paypal API keys rolled
- Internal refactoring
- Minor UI bugs
- Internal manual hack error
- Minor speed enhancements
- Minor bug fix for Manual Hacks
- Updates to Manual Hack process including better messaging and alerts when ready
- Updates to Package visibility on extension
- Increased speed of extension
- Add visibility of your CF Account ID on Clone button
- Addition of Multi-Account Add Feature from within the Extension, now you can purchase additional Clickfunnels accounts to add pages to
- 3 Free Hacks for New Accounts
- Minor Fixes to functionality and blurring feature
- Minor Updates to the Manual Hacks feature
- Minor Fixes to AUTOSAVE function
- Minor Fixes to Obfuscation to remove text update on Input Fields and Order Form elements
- Minor Updates to clone function, some pages weren't saving due to invalid source pages. These pages are now working ok.
- Manual hacks! Submit ANY landing page on the web to our team and within 48hrs or less, we will recreate it as a Clickfunnels page for you
- Autosave: 1 less click for you :D
- Improvements to dashboard functions and history
- Purchase membership or one-time hack packages is now live!
- Updated Chrome permissions for faster access
- Bug fix for recent Google permission update

FREE VERSION USAGE:
1) Open the Clickfunnels editor to the page you want to copy
2) Click the extension icon
3) Select COPY button
4) Open the Clickfunnels editor to a new page you want to clone to
5) Click the extension icon again and now click the CLONE button
6) Wait for the SAVE button to appear in the extension, then click it
7) Wait for EXIT EDITOR / CONTINUE buttons to appear and select one
8) Page will reload or close

*Register for Paid Version*
1) Open the Clickfunnels editor
2) Click the extension icon
3) Click REGISTER button
4) Fill out your details and create your account
5) Close dashboard

PAID VERSION USAGE:
1) Open ANY live Clickfunnels page
2) Click the extension icon
3) Select COPY button
4) Open the Clickfunnels editor to a new page you want to clone to
5) Click the extension icon again and now click the CLONE button
6) Wait for the SAVE button to appear in the extension, then click it
7) Wait for EXIT EDITOR / CONTINUE buttons to appear and select one
8) Page will reload or close

For any issues, please contact Nathan@funnelfixit.com
